File: projgen.py¶

Copyright (c) 2015 Freescale Semiconductor

Brief¶

Main file for KSDK project creation GUI

Code author: M. Hunt <Martyn.Hunt@freescale.com>

Section author: M. Hunt <Martyn.Hunt@freescale.com>

New in version 0.0.5.

File: ksdkGUI.py¶

Copyright (c) 2015 Freescale Semiconductor

Brief¶

Class for PGKSDK GUI

Code author: M. Hunt <Martyn.Hunt@freescale.com>

Section author: M. Hunt <Martyn.Hunt@freescale.com>

New in version 0.0.5.

Inheritance¶

UML¶

API¶

ksdkGUI.PGKSDK_NAME = 'KSDK Project Generator'¶

PGKSDK name displayed in window bar

ksdkGUI.PGKSDK_VERSION = '1.0'¶

PGKSDK Version displayed in window bar

class ksdkGUI.PgGui(master=None)[source]¶

This class contains all the methods used to generate the GUI widgets

advanced_gui(master)[source]¶

Callback method to launch Advanced options menu

Parameters:master – Tkinter object
advanced_help(master, helpText)[source]¶

Callback function for ‘Help’ button to provide a brieft user guide and links to websites

Parameters:
  • master – Tkinter object
  • helpText – Text string to be displayed in pop-up window
ask_set_directory(isTyped, widgetIndex)[source]¶

Callback method for browe selection of KSDK directory

begin_advanced_gen(master, window)[source]¶
begin_quick_gen(master)[source]¶
build_advanced(master)[source]¶

Build project based on advanced settings.

clone_update(*args)[source]¶

Update the advanced GUI when the user picks a new board

close_and_run(master, window)[source]¶

Call main GUI and destroy the pop-up.

launch_basic(master)[source]¶

Show warning that the other menu will not build based on the settings in the advanced menu.

main_gui(master)[source]¶

Main class method for generate first menu ‘Quick start menu’

It appends the list of widgets (buttons, labels, entries, etc...) in order for the next menu method to remove those widgets on launch.

Parameters:master – Tkinter object
package_select(master)[source]¶

Pop-up to prompt user for a package

poll_advanced()[source]¶

Method to poll user selection of advanced menu in order to update

poll_selection()[source]¶

Method to poll user selection of listbox in order to update image

pop_adv_devices()[source]¶

Method to populate list of devices in advanced menu

pop_main_boards()[source]¶

Method to populate list of boards in main_gui’s listbox

pop_up_help(master, helpText)[source]¶

Callback function for ‘Help’ button to provide a brieft user guide and links to websites

Parameters:
  • master – Tkinter object
  • helpText – Text string to be displayed in pop-up window
proj_set_directory(isTyped, widgetIndex)[source]¶

Callback method for browe selection of directory

qck_gen_proj(master)[source]¶
Callback method to generate project, tell user where the project is now located,
and open folder.
Parameters:master – Tkinter object
safe_return(window)[source]¶

When pop-up is closed, safely without build

update_dev(*args)[source]¶

Update GUI from device to board and vice versa

update_gui(*args)[source]¶

Updates advanced GUI based on ‘new’ or ‘clone’ selection

update_package(*args)[source]¶

Update project device package

update_tips(usageText)[source]¶

Callback method to display help text when user hovers over a widget

Parameters:usageText – Text string to be displayed in GUI
view_project(pathString, window)[source]¶

Open containing folder and destroy window

static web_launch(boardName)[source]¶

Callback method to launch freescale.com webpage for selected board or KSDK

Parameters:boardName – String of board that has been selected.

File: ksdkObj.py¶

Copyright (c) 2015 Freescale Semiconductor

Brief¶

Class for creating a KSDK object

Code author: M. Hunt <Martyn.Hunt@freescale.com>

Section author: M. Hunt <Martyn.Hunt@freescale.com>

New in version 0.0.5.

Inheritance¶

UML¶

API¶

ksdkObj.toolList = [('GCC Makefile', 'armgcc', 'gcc'), ('Kinetis Design Studio', 'kds', 'gcc'), ('Atollic TrueSTUDIO', 'atl', 'gcc'), ('IAR Embedded Workbench for ARM', 'iar', 'iar'), ('Keil MDK-ARM', 'mdk', 'arm')]¶

List of supported toolchains

class ksdkObj.kinetisSDK(ksdkPath)[source]¶
get_boards()[source]¶

Use ksdk_manifest file to get supported board list

get_dev_pkg(deviceName)[source]¶

Use ksdk_manifest file to get supported device packages

Parameters:deviceName – name of device being used
get_devices()[source]¶

Use ksdk_manifest file to get supported devices

get_drivers()[source]¶

Use ksdk_manifest file to get supported platform driver list

get_hal()[source]¶

Use ksdk_manifest file to get support HAL list

get_libs()[source]¶

Browse lib folder to get supported library list

get_other()[source]¶

Use ksdk_manifest file to get other supported drivers

get_projects(boardName)[source]¶

Use board and ksdk tree to list available projects

Parameters:boardName – name of board used to find demos

Todo

Add 1.3.0 support

get_version()[source]¶

Get KSDK version from manifest file

New in version 0.0.5.

UML¶

API¶

class ksdkProj.ksdkProjClass(prjName, ksdkVer, ksdkPath, osName, userName, date)[source]¶
add_all_drv(driverList)[source]¶

Add all drivers to project paths

Parameters:driverList – list of drivers
add_all_hal(halList)[source]¶

Add all HAL components to the project

Parameters:halList – list of HAL components to be added
add_board(boardSelection, boardList)[source]¶

Map user’s board selection back to the boards list to get names for project dependencies

Parameters:
  • boardSelection – index of board list from GUI
  • boardList – list of boards in KSDK installation
add_device(fullName)[source]¶

Populate device tuple from device fullName

Parameters:fullName – name of the device to add
add_tool(toolSelect)[source]¶

Add toolchain to the project

Parameters:toolSelect – index of toolList to be added from project
clean_up()[source]¶

Cleans up project information to avoid including previous data

copy_all_components(destParent, cloneName, status)[source]¶

Copies all device related components to create a standalone project

copy_device_components(destParent, status)[source]¶

Copies all device related components to create a standalone project

fast_build_GCC()[source]¶

Quick Generate GCC project

get_proj_config()[source]¶

Summarize project configuration into string

lib_set_package(projectPath)[source]¶

Configure library project for the selected package

Parameters:projectPath – path of lib project to edit
make_hw_file(sourcePath)[source]¶

Create hardware_init file for project

Parameters:sourcePath – absolute path to which hardware_init will be added
make_main_file(sourcePath, includeList)[source]¶

Generate the main.c and main.h files for the project

Parameters:
  • sourcePath – directory to which main files will be added
  • includeList – list of drivers to be added
static my_thread_monitor(myThreads, numThreads)[source]¶

Very crude thread monitor

proj_clone(cloneName, status)[source]¶

Clone existing KSDK project

Parameters:cloneName – name of the project to clone
remove_tool(toolSelect)[source]¶

Remove toolchain to the project

Parameters:toolSelect – index of toolList to be removed from project

API¶

ksdkTools.PG_SESSION = None¶

Controls debug_log behavior: ‘debug’, ‘log’, or None

class ksdkTools.KsdkTools[source]¶
static cdt_fix_post_xml(dirPath)[source]¶

Fixed .cproject files after using xml write in python.

Parameters:dirPath – path to directory containing .cproject file
static check_proj_name(nameString)[source]¶

Checks project name for validity

Parameters:nameString – string containing the project name
Returns:True if string is valid, False if invalid
static check_wksp_name(nameString)[source]¶

Checks workspace path for validity

Parameters:nameString – string containing the workspace path
Returns:True if string is valid, False if invalid
static debug_log(outStr, errMsg=None)[source]¶

Used to print messages to the console for debugging or to console a log file if not a debug session

Parameters:
  • outStr – Message to display in terminal
  • errMsg – Exception traceback string
static get_all_indices(strName, charName)[source]¶

Returns a list of all indices of a char in string

Parameters:
  • strName – String to search
  • charName – Character to search for
static get_rel_path(pathOrigin, pathDest)[source]¶

Takes two paths, and returns a string to navigate to the second from the first

Parameters:
  • pathOrigin – String containing the path to navigate from
  • pathDest – String containing the path to navigate to
Returns:

String of relative path
static get_smartcard_type(ksdkPath, partName)[source]¶

Returns smartcard type from feature file

: param ksdkPath: Path to KSDK parent directory : param partName: Family name of part

static list_dirs(dirPath)[source]¶

Returns list of all directories in path

Parameters:dirPath – absolute path to seach for directories
Returns:A list of directory names in the path
static list_files(filePath)[source]¶

Returns list of all files in path

Parameters:filePath – absolute path to seach for files
Returns:A list of file names in the path
mask_features(ksdkPath, ksdkVersion, featureList, partName, packName)[source]¶

Mask off features based on what is available for this part

Parameters:
  • ksdkPath – Absolute path of KSDK installation being used
  • ksdkVersion – version of the KSDK being used
  • featureList – List of features to be modified
  • partName – Name of target part
static pretty_xml(xmlElement, xmlEncoding)[source]¶

Edit xml element to make it more readable

Parameters:
  • xmlElement – xml element to formatted
  • xmlEncoding – xml encoding
Returns:

Tab formatted xml string to be parsed
static replace_name_in_file(filePath, oldString, newString)[source]¶

Change references from oldString to newString

Parameters:
  • filePath – File to be modified
  • oldString – The current substring
  • newString – The substring that will be inserted
static string_replace(userString, oldString, newString)[source]¶

This function replaces a substring and returns the new string

Parameters:
  • userString – The string to be modified
  • oldString – The current substring
  • newString – The substring that will be inserted
Returns:

A newly modified string
classmethod update_file(oldFile, oldName, newName)[source]¶

Updates file to change name and references to new name

Parameters:
  • oldFile – path to file
  • oldName – refrence name to be changed in file and in file name
  • newName – new name to be used
static update_json_file(fileName, valueKey, newVal)[source]¶

Updated JSON file with new value for specified key

Parameters:
  • fileName – Name of file to update (needs path)
  • valueKey – Key of JSON entry to update
  • newVal – New value to write
classmethod usb_make_list_update(isDevice, filePath, cloneName, newName)[source]¶

Special file update for usb CMakeLists.txt

Parameters:
  • isDevice – is USB device?
  • filePath – path to CMakeLists.txt
  • cloneName – name from clonable list in GUI
  • newName – name of the new project being created
